outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this Climate Change enabling activity is to conduct a through needs assessment and analysis of the critical areas for UNFCCC implementation in PNG. The project will fund a self-assessment of climate change realted activities that are either cpmleted or under preparation that are relevant to the formulation of the Second Climate Change National Communication Report. The main objective is to undertake a highly consultative and participatory process of needs assessment to identify and validate the critical priorities for further in-dept studies during the preparation of the Second National Communication

project_descr: This Climate Change Enabling Activity (PDF-A) will produce a project proposal to GEF to fund the production of a PNG's Second National Communication Report (SNC) to the United Nations Framework on Climate Change..
